In the filename There is a letter in (...). Ie (U) or (E).
I guess this is the language on the game. But what does the diffrent letter stands for?
ive tryed loading fifa 11 on my dstt and it say errorcode 4 rom loading failed, any ideas/help

what are country codes(U)usa ?uk?universal?
(J) japan
(E)english? espania? european?
(K)?(N)? please PLEASE clarriffy

U: universal
E: English
G: German
J: Japanese
EU: European

Those are the ones I know but the rest you can probably figure it out by yourself. Usually U roms are a pretty safe bet for anything.
